title: *Remodeled 2 bed Humboldt Park, hwd, granite, outdoor space, pets ok
posting_body: QR Code Link to This Post
Totally rehabbed and well maintained affordable 2 bedroom apartment on the cusp of Logan Square and Humboldt Park on a nice quiet residential street in a stately greystone building.
Unit features Hwd floors, granite counter tops, dishwasher, good sized rooms
It is all about location as you can walk to the Western Ave blueline to take you to O'hare airport or the central business district.
I90/94 takes you to the suburbs or downtown.
You are hidden from the hustle and bustle yet steps away from all boutique shops, restaurants, and liveliness these quirky and hip neighborhoods have to offer.
Qualifications - income at least 3 times the rent monthly, good credit (above 600), no evictions, and solid references .
